main event: An observer sighted a flashing silver light that traveled east and disappeared in 3 to 4 seconds, estimated to be 100 ft across.
interesting points: The object traveled quickly, disappearing within a few seconds., The observer described the object as silver with a pointed top., There were reports of similar sightings of UFOs with multiple colored lights in Miami Beach., Sounds associated with UFO sightings included a high-frequency humming., This sighting was part of a larger pattern of UFO reports in the Miami area during that time.
witness description: an observer who reported the sighting
